General.Name: AL-BABTAIN POWER &TELECOM CO
General.Description: Al-Babtain Power and Telecommunications Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacturing and supply of power and telecommunications products and solutions in the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, and Egyptian Arabic Republic. The company operates through Towers and Metal Structures Sector; Pole and Lighting Sector; Design, Supply, and Installation Sector; and Solar Energy Sector segments. The Towers and Metal Structures Sector segment engages in production of power transmission towers, galvanized communication towers and tests, and galvanized steel structures. Its Pole and Lighting Sector segment offers production and galvanization of electricity and lighting poles, masts, and accessories; and production of street lighting lanterns for playgrounds and gardens, as well as electricity distribution panels. The Design, Supply, and Installation Sector segment supply, installs, and maintains communication system. Its Solar Energy Sector segment engages in the production of mobile metal components for solar photovoltaic energy tracking systems. In addition, it designs and produces poles, masts, and lanterns for lighting streets, stadiums, and squares, as well as towers and poles for power transmission and communications; manufactures, markets, and sells decorative poles and LED lighting; and installs, operates, and maintains programs for telecommunications systems, computer devices, and networks, as well as mechanical and electrical equipment for factories. The company installs, maintains, and repairs wind energy networks and generates electric energy; offers electrical and mechanical works; and engages in designing, supplying, installing, and maintaining communication systems, as well as provides oil and gas field services including contracting. Al-Babtain Power and Telecommunications Company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
